system.name: Earthroil
system.effect: Your Ground-Type Pok√©mon may activate Earthroil as a Shift Action to use a damaging Ground-Type Move as it had a range of Line 4 or Burst 1 instead of its usual range, and as if it had the Groundsource keyword. 1-Target Moves performed this way take a -5 penalty to their Damage Rolls.
system.prerequisites: Mold the Earth, Type-Linked Skill at Expert
